content: In the first quarter last year, I elaborated on our growth strategies and business model transformation in order to provide our customers a hassle-free use card purchase experience with massive high quality and valuable money vehicle connections, as well as superior before and after self-services. We have established acquisition channels to purchase used cards from individual consumers, auction platforms, auto manufacturers, and car dealerships direct purchase from individual consumers account for 30% of our total acquired vehicles in the fourth quarter.
